name: unselfconsciously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without worrying about other people's opinions of you, about doing things in a particular way, or about being impressive: He squatted unselfconsciously in the mud. She danced unself-consciously, beaming throughout. They sit around quite easily and un-self-consciously in their old clothes. Opposite
self-consciouslyRelated words
unselfconscious
unselfconsciousness
More examplesFewer examplesShe coos unselfconsciously over other people's children.The children found us intriguing, gazing unselfconsciously before being pulled away by their mothers.He was energetic, bounding around the stage unselfconsciously. He opened the file and considered the document, unhurriedly and unselfconsciously.They play unselfconsciously uplifting tunes.The sight of the band members bouncing unself-consciously around the stage was as joyful as the music itself.The word is used matter-of-factly, even unself-consciously.
